document.docAuthor: Th, Zoi N., Lekkou, D., Koutsogi, Terini, St, D., Voulg, N., Piperk, Sios, Ch, Terini & Ts, Ntonios E.
document.masterDocTitle: New records and updated checklist of Cicadomorpha (Hemiptera: Auchenorrhyncha) species from Greece

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New records and updated checklist of Cicadomorpha (Hemiptera: Auchenorrhyncha) species from Greece

subSubSection.paragraph: Mantoudi (Euboea), Pelekanada (Messinia), Stimagka (Corinth), Αthens (Αttica), Karavomilos (Fthiotida), Elaea (Kiparissia, Messinia), Orhomenos (Boeotia)
Cultivation: OL, CIT, VI, GP, ΑL, FT
Trapping method: Malaise trap and sweep-net
General distribution: Germany , The Netherlands ( McKamey 2001 )

Many of the newly recorded species are first records for the Balkan Peninsula and some even for Europe, as for example
Anzygina honiloa
is reported only from Αustralia and Japan , according to Fletcher & Lariviere (2009) . Seasonal abundance of these species will be given in following manuscripts about Αuchenorrhyncha in specific cultivations.
